string.value: I have reached the highest level of the elemental attributes. Is there a stronger attribute magic that I can learn? Let's go ask #b#p2020005##k.

#b#p2020005##k mentioned about inverse attributes, and suggested that we research it. He wants me to bring him the ingredients for the research....
#i4000181##t4000181# #b#c4000181#/30#k
#i4000150##t4000150# #b#c4000150#/40#k
#i4000185##t4000185# #b#c4000185#/30
I gathered all ingredients for the inverse attributes. But does #b#p2020005##k know what he's doing?

You're an excellent magician. I can feel the strong power of fire magic within you. #bThe one who mastered fire element#k... I've learned magic for a long time but never seen anyone who knows fire element magic more than you. I'm really excited to see you to talk about the element!

Hmm? You reached the peak of the fire element-based magic? What does that unhappy look mean? Are you complaining because there's no more thing to learn? Haha... Your passion has made you a master. You need something new. Why don't you have try the principles of #bcopernican revolution#k?

What do I mean? Simple. Try to learn the magic of the opposite element, in this case, ice. I mean inverse element-based magic. If you choose one element and mastered it, you've got to give up. But now you can learn something new when you're done. Isn't it interesting?
I can see you're interested in it. Do you want to work with me?
Oh! Are you interested? Then go and gather these ingredients: #b30 #t4000181#, 40 #t4000150# and 30 #t4000185#.
Hmm... Maybe you're not interested. Stick with your old magic for now.
Oh! You gathered everything. Let me do some experiments based on the research I've done till now. Give me a few minutes here...
Have you gathered everything I need yet? I think not!
